verses.roman:
tathāpi prakāre tomā karāitāma daraśana
samprati karilā teṅho dakṣiṇa gamana

synonyms: tathāpi—yet; prakāre—somehow or other; tomā—you; karāitāma—I would have arranged; daraśana—interview; samprati—recently; karilā—has done; teṅho—He; dakṣiṇa—to the southern part of India; gamana—departure.
translation: "Still, I would have tried to arrange your interview, but He has recently left to tour South India."
